name: Mönölith
description:
EPIC JAM 2019 "Down to Earth" Submission

The game uses the idea of bringing down to earth a floating island destroying the magic crystals which makes it float.

HOW TO PLAY

Choose a player and defend your totem's island!
Each game is divided within rounds.
In each round, a particular player's island will be focused, and attacking players have to destroy all 4 light rocks from that island before round's time finishes.
The player defending can hit other players and throw them out of the island. Try to return if you can!

When round finishes, everyone returns to the lower island, and it's your time to get some power ups for the next round:

  • If defending, you can leave a bomb that will stun players whom affect.
  • If attacking, you can leave a bomb that will throw affected players away.

The player whom's island is the last in battle wins the game.

Player Selection: 

  • Enter for keyboard (Player 0) && X/A for Controllers.
  • Right Joystick and A-D for changing character.

Gameplay:

  • Left Joystick: Move
  • X (Ps4) / A (XBOX): Jump (you can hold to charge. Beware of overcharging!)
  • Square (Ps4) / X (XBOX): Dash+Attack (hold to charge)
  • L1: Shield (if power up picked up) 
  • R1: Bomb (if power up picked up)
